name: guacamole
tagline: A browser-based remote desktop gateway for servers and devices
description: Apache Guacamole is a remote desktop gateway supporting RDP, VNC, SSH, and Kubernetes access via a browser. Users can access desktops and servers securely without client software.

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Connect to remote desktops and servers through any web browser without plugins

features.title: Kubernetes Ready
features.description: Access systems via RDP, VNC, SSH, and Kubernetes with a unified interface

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and download files between local and remote systems during sessions

features.title: User Management
features.description: Centralized user authentication with LDAP, Active Directory, or database backends

features.title: Connection Profiles
features.description: Save connection settings and credentials for quick access to frequently used systems
